app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps Daystar
app_description: The Daystar app is a new way to interact with the fastest growing faith based network in the world! You can enjoy the Daystar live stream or keep up with your favorite videos with Daystar on Demand. Features: Watch Daystar Television Live anytime anywhere! Save a list of your favorite shows available on demand. View a weekly schedule of the live stream. Submit Prayer Requests Praise Reports and more. Submit Videos Pictures and maybe even be included in an upcoming program! Closed Captioning of live stream and selected shows available. Live stream is broadcast in US Central time Terms of Service: https: www.daystar.tv tos Privacy Policy: https: www.daystar.tv privacy
